Membership at Deerwood Country Club
Now is a great time to join Deerwood Country Club as we enter the final phase of a multimillion-dollar, multi-year renovation and beautification plan designed to enhance and improve every facet of club life. Â Here's a snapshot of the exceptional improvements for you to enjoy as a new member.
JOIN TODAY!
Start a New Tradition at One of Jacksonvilleâ€™s Most Historic Private Clubs
Founded in 1960 as North Floridaâ€™s first gated golf course community, Deerwood Country Club is steeped in tradition and rich in legacy.
Over the decades, weâ€™ve welcomed PGA legends, top tennis professionals, and even President Gerald Ford.
Today, that legacy continues in a setting defined by Southern hospitality, timeless charm, and a welcoming community our members proudly call home.
Deerwood Country Club is more than a clubâ€”itâ€™s a place to relax, connect, and create lifelong memories with family and friends.
Member-Owned, Member-Focused
As a member-owned club, Deerwood offers two distinct membership opportunities to suit your lifestyle:
Equity Membership
As a club owner, Equity Members enjoy voting rights, eligibility to serve on boards and committees, priority placement in tournaments, annual guest passes, and additional perks for immediate family members living at home (up to age 26). Equity certificates are fully transferable.
Associate Membership
Designed for Deerwood residents and families living outside the gates, Associate Membership offers full access to club amenities for the entire household (up to age 24). With more than 200 Associate Members from across Duval County and beyond, Deerwood is a true citywide community.
Join today and enjoy exclusive access to a wide array of premium amenities:
* Championship Golf Course
Originally designed by PGA architect George Cobb (Par 72, 6 tee sets, 7,261 yards),
the course is scheduled for an exciting redesign in 2025â€“26.
* Fully Upgraded Practice Facilities
Including two putting greens, practice bunkers, and a dedicated chipping area.
* 12 Har-Tru Tennis Courts
All upgraded, with 10 courts lit for evening play.
* 4 New Pickleball Courts
Perfect for both recreational and competitive play.
* Fitness Center
Featuring separate spaces for cardio, weights, and group classesâ€”
with personal training packages available andÂ Massage therapy.
* Kidsâ€™ Club
Offering childcare, seasonal camps, and fun programs for children ages 3 months to 11 years.
* Junior Olympic-Size Aquatic Center
Includes zero-entry to 6-ft depth, lap lanes, and a spa. Home to our swim team,
The Torpedoes, and offering swim lessons for all ages.
* Dining Options
Enjoy full-service poolside dining, family-friendly meals at 1960, or a more casual atmosphere at
Samâ€™s Place, with stunning verandah viewsÂ of Lake Deerwood and the golf course.
* Elegant Clubhouse
A beautifully renovated 25,000 sq. ft. space featuring both indoor and outdoor venues
for meetings, events, and lifeâ€™s most memorable celebrations.
Discover why generations of families have made Deerwood Country Club their home club.
For more information or to schedule a private tour, please contact:
Audrey Reiley, Membership & Marketing Director
ðŸ“§
[emailÂ protected]
ðŸ“ž (904) 641-6100 ext. 106
You are invited to discover Deerwood Country Club
End Mini-Page 580204
EQUITY MEMBERSHIP BENEFITS
Begin Mini-Page 580271
Deerwood Country Club is a Member Owned Private Equity Club with membership open by invitation. Each prospective member must be sponsored by two current members in good standing, and each application will be reviewed and approved by the Board of Governors.
Equity
members are shareholders who vote and hold office, and enjoy unique benefits and perks, their unmarried children are included up to age 26.Â Equity Partner Privileges include: priority tee times; priority event registration and banquet bookings; priorities for lockers; special by-invitation-only parties and business meetings.
Equity certificates are
redeemable for 85 percent of the current value when fully vested (paid in full
and active member for a
minimum of three consecutive years).
Equity is transferable.
New Members Monetary Fees consist of a one-time initiation -
$10,250 in redeemable equity plus initiation fee
$5,125 Junior Members plus initiation fee(a true-up applies when turning 40)
$5,125Â Â in redeemableÂ equity for Legacy MembersÂ plus initiation fee for children of equity members
Equity members select their category.
PERKS AND BENEFITS*
â€¢ Priority placement regarding membership privileges
(e.g., placement in limited tournament openings, tournament preference,
advanced tee-times, and event reservations).
â€¢ Complimentary annual equity passes:
12 passes for
Golf with cart fee only
12 passes for
Fitness Center
12 passes for
Racquet Courts
12 passes for Aquatics
â€¢ Capital Assessment relief for those 85 years and 25
years of consecutive membership (not capital reserve)
â€¢ Reduced Golf
Guest fees (10%)
â€¢ Reduced Cart fees at age 71 (10%)
â€¢ Annual Equity Appreciation Social Celebration
â€¢ 25% off your Birthday Dinner (excluding alcohol & up
to 10 guests)
â€¢ Complementary Room Rental for business and social
events
â€¢ 15% Discount on Banquet guide food pricing
â€¢ Complimentary Key Fob (one per family)
â€¢ Reduced fees in Kids Club (10%)
â€¢ Children are
included up to 26 years (unmarried & living at home)
â€¢ Legacy Memberships available for your children
â€¢ Eligible to serve on Board of Governors
â€¢ Voting privileges
â€¢ Equity members have access to all amenities
regardless of category (pay as you go at applicable fees)
*Passes are loaded electronically annually January 1 and
expire December 31. To redeem your passes, you are required to inform your
attendant when making reservations for your guests. Equity passes are not
transferable and are subject to proration. Reservations required,
parameters/restrictions in place. Estimated value is $30,000+ and reflects current
pricing and fees which are subject to change per the Board of Governors. DCC
Bylaws outline equity governing details in full.
End Mini-Page 580271
FULL AND JUNIOR FULL
Begin Mini-Page 580275
Full and Junior Full Members enjoy all Club amenities; Golf Course, Practice Range, GHIN handicap, Tennis,
Pickleball, Fitness, Aquatics, Dining, Social Events, Massage Therapy, Kids Club, Clinics, Camps and our very own swim team, The Torpedoes.Â (Cart fees apply. No charge to walk).
Junior Full Memberships are for those that are under the age of 40. Upon turning 40 Full membership fees will apply.
End Mini-Page 580275
SPORTS
Begin Mini-Page 580274
Sports Members enjoy unlimited access to Racquet Courts, Fitness Center and Classes, Aquatics, Massage Therapy, Dining, Social Events,Â Kids Club, Clinics, Camps and our very own swim team, The Torpedoes.Â  Golf privilege'sÂ encompass six rounds per year with a cart fee, after the sixth round, golf is available on a pay-as-play basis. Practice Range fee applies, either daily, monthly or annual.
End Mini-Page 580274
CLUB
Begin Mini-Page 580376
Club members enjoy access to Tennis, Pickleball, Fitness Center andÂ  our Classes, Sauna/Steam Room, Aquatic Center, Massage Therapy, Dining, Social Events, Kids Club, Clinics, Camps and our very own swim team, The Torpedoes.
End Mini-Page 580376
DINING & AQUATICS
Begin Mini-Page 580272
Members enjoy Dining, Social Events, Aquatics,Â  Massage Therapy, Kids Club, Clinics, Camps and our very own swim team, the Torpedoes.
End Mini-Page 580272
EXECUTIVE BUSINESS
Begin Mini-Page 580335
Executive Business: Company
designees enjoy reduced
initiation fees and dues rates
plus unique privileges catered to the individual corporate needs. Includes Full benefit privileges for 4 -10 Full individuals and their family. Executive Full Members enjoy Golf, Racquet Sports, Fitness Center and Classes, Aquatics, Dining and Social Events and Kids Club, Camps and Spa services.
Features
â€¢Unlimited access to the Golf course with Complimentary Greens fees.
â€¢Complimentary Practice Range, with two putting greens, practice bunkers and chipping green.
â€¢Cart fees of $30 per player apply for eighteen holes.
â€¢Access to all club sponsored Social Activities and Events.
â€¢$500 credit toward private corporate meetings or functions per year.
â€¢Complimentary room rental (minimums and AV charges apply).
â€¢Full business meeting, event, and tournament planning coordination.
â€¢Complimentary advertising space in the monthly newsletter for three (3) consecutive months.
QualifiersÂ in place.
End Mini-Page 580335
NATIONAL
Begin Mini-Page 580417
Full benefits for those with a primary address 50 miles or more outside of Jacksonville (qualifiers in place) Nonresident members enjoy four (4) months (121 Days) of access to Golf, Tennis, Pickleball, Fitness Center and Classes, Sauna/Steam Room, Aquatic Center, Dining, Massage Therapy, Social Events, and Six days of golf play with cart fee, after the sixth day of play Cart & Green fees apply. Practice Range fees apply.
End Mini-Page 580417
